name: pasteguard
description: Privacy proxy for LLMs - masks PII and secrets before upstream or routes to local LLM. OpenAI API compatible.
readme_summary: PasteGuard is an OpenAI-compatible proxy that protects sensitive data by masking Personally Identifiable Information (PII) and secrets before they are sent to external LLM APIs. It offers two modes: Mask Mode for replacing data with placeholders and Route Mode for directing sensitive requests to local LLMs, ensuring data privacy.
key_features: PII Detection (Names, Emails, Phone Numbers, Credit Cards, IBANs, IP Addresses, Locations)
Secrets Detection (API Keys, Tokens, Private Keys)
primary_use_case: To act as a privacy-preserving proxy for Large Language Model (LLM) API calls, preventing sensitive data from being exposed to third-party providers by masking or routing it locally.
cover_image_prompt: A vigilant digital gatekeeper, represented as a stylized, glowing shield, stands between a user's computer screen displaying sensitive text (like names and credit card numbers) and a cloud icon representing an external LLM API. The shield actively filters the text, transforming sensitive parts into abstract, unreadable symbols before they pass through to the cloud. The background is a clean, modern interface with subtle data streams. The overall mood is secure and protective, with a color palette of blues, greens, and subtle reds for detected PII. The style is a 3D isometric illustration with a focus on clear iconography and a sense of digital security.

name: super
description: ðŸ“¡ SPR: Open Source, secure, user friendly and fast wifi routers for your home. One wifi password per device. Ad Blocking & Privacy Blocklists. Policy Based Network Access
readme_summary: SPR is an open-source, user-friendly, and secure WiFi router solution designed for home networks. It offers advanced features like per-device WiFi passwords, granular network access control, and integrated ad blocking, all managed through a modern React-based user interface.
key_features: Policy Based / Zero Trust Network Access
Per-Device DNS Rules & Ad Block Lists
primary_use_case: To provide a secure, user-friendly, and highly customizable WiFi router experience for home networks, enabling granular control over device access, security, and network traffic.
cover_image_prompt: A futuristic home router depicted as a central, glowing hub with multiple distinct, color-coded pathways emanating from it. Each pathway leads to a different device icon (laptop, phone, smart TV) and is secured by a unique, glowing digital shield. One pathway is highlighted, showing a 'zero trust' access gate with a digital key, representing policy-based access. Subtle elements like small, floating data packets and a minimalist UI overlay showing 'Device Passphrase' and 'Ad Blocked' indicators connect it to networking technology. The overall mood is secure and organized, with a clean, modern aesthetic in a 3D isometric illustration style.

name: reqpane
description: Chrome extension for capturing API calls
readme_summary: Reqpane is a Chrome extension that acts as a side panel debugger for network requests. It intercepts API calls, allows for filtering, viewing, comparing, and mocking responses, and includes advanced features like load testing and field usage detection.
key_features: Filtering & Search (URL, body, errors, slow requests)
Export Options (HAR, Postman, Claude, Markdown, Sessions)
primary_use_case: Debugging and analyzing network requests directly within the Chrome browser's side panel.
cover_image_prompt: A digital detective, wearing a magnifying glass as a monocle and a sleek, modern trench coat, stands in a dimly lit, futuristic control room. Before them, a holographic interface displays a stream of glowing data packets representing API requests. The detective is actively manipulating these packets with a digital stylus, sorting them into different bins labeled 'Errors', 'Slow', and 'Console Logs', while a secondary holographic screen shows a side-by-side comparison of two selected packets. Subtle UI elements from the Reqpane extension are visible on the main interface. The overall mood is one of focused investigation and clarity amidst complexity. The art style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a dark, tech-noir aesthetic and vibrant neon accents.

name: nightwatcher
description: Web-based IP camera viewer for fast, simple streaming in any browser ðŸ¦‡
readme_summary: Night Watcher is a web-based IP camera viewer designed for fast, simple, and delay-free streaming in any browser. It supports local models and custom detection scripts, prioritizing privacy and extensibility.
key_features: Performance: Blazing fast streaming without any delay
Cross Platform Support: Works on any device with a browser
Privacy & Extensibility: Local models and custom detection script support
Simplicity: Minimal navigations and css styles
primary_use_case: Viewing IP camera streams in a web browser with custom detection capabilities.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, stylized bat wearing a monocle, perched on a large, antique telescope. The telescope is pointed towards a distant, vibrant cityscape, and through its lens, a clear, real-time video feed of a family's living room is visible, showing a cat napping peacefully. Subtle digital particles flow from the bat's wings towards the telescope, representing data processing. The background is a soft, gradient sky with a hint of a digital grid. The overall mood is secure and observant. The image should be in a whimsical, 3D illustration style with a focus on clear, friendly visuals and a warm color palette.

name: Grid-Mobile
description: Grid: Private Location Sharing mobile app for iOS/Android. E2EE with Matrix.
readme_summary: Grid is a cross-platform mobile application for iOS and Android that enables secure, end-to-end encrypted (E2EE) location sharing. It leverages the Matrix protocol for communication and offers self-hosting capabilities for enhanced privacy and control.
primary_use_case: Secure and private real-time location sharing between trusted contacts or groups.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, transparent map unfolds, with glowing, secure pathways connecting small, distinct user icons. One user icon is actively broadcasting a subtle, encrypted data stream, visualized as a shimmering, protected bubble, towards other selected icons. The background is a soft, abstract digital grid, hinting at the Matrix protocol. Small, minimalist UI elements showing connection status and encryption levels are subtly integrated into the scene. The overall mood is one of secure, private connection and control. The art style should be a clean, modern 3D isometric illustration with a cool color palette of blues and greens, emphasizing privacy and technology.
